medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The abdominal pain was acute in onset, waking the patient from sleep at approximately 10pm last night. The patient felt nausea and experienced diffuse aching pain in the abdomen. The pain worsened throughout the night, intensifying to a sharp and constant pain in the right upper quadrant. The patient also experienced subjective fever and chills.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Currently on methadone for history of heroin use.
